BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix overwriting the Healthcheck configuration from the image If the --health-cmd flag is not specified, other flags such as --health-interval, --health-timeout, --health-retries, and --health-start-period are ignored if the image contains a Healthcheck. This makes it impossible to modify these Healthcheck configuration when a container is created. Fixes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/20212 Fixes: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/RUN-2629 Signed-off-by: Jan Rodák <hony.com@seznam.cz>
